data.7: Mail - Type of transportation provided by the U.S. Postal Service
data.AH: Air Taxi - FAA approved carrier utilizing a 1 or 2 engine aircraft for on demand service
data.AR: Armed Forces Courier Service (ARFCOS) - A military organization whose mission involves the receipt, movement, and delivery of special categories of material
data.DA: Driveaway Service - Movement of wheeled vehicle, wheeled equipment, or wheeled chassis of which is powered by a self-contained power unit (includes tractor/trailer combination)
data.DW: Driveaway, Truckaway, Towaway - DoD policy includes all three terms in one. They mean collectively, a transportation method whereby a vehicle is moved under its own power by a driver, or loaded into or upon a carrier's equipment, or towed by carrier's equipment
data.ED: European or Pacific Distribution System - Military operated logistic distribution system within the indicated theaters of operation
data.F: Flyaway - When an aircraft is sold to a customer, the delivery flight (non-revenue) includes goods and products (such as spare parts) as part of the contract
data.FA: Air Freight Forwarder - A firm other than a railroad, motor, or water carrier, which represents itself as a common carrier and undertakes to assemble and consolidate shipments or provide for same and assumes responsibility for the air transportation of such property from point of receipt to its destination. Delivery is "Held in Bond"
data.GG: Geographic Receiving/Shipping - A collection of shipments that involve multiple origins, multiple destinations, and a single trailer, and are paid under a single freight bill
data.GR: Geographic Receiving - A collection of shipments that involve a single origin, multiple destinations, and a single trailer, and are paid under a single freight bill
data.GS: Geographic Shipping - A collection of shipments that involve multiple origins, a single destination, and a single trailer, and are paid under a single freight bill
data.LA: Logair - Air Force long-term contract airlift service within the continental United States for the movement of cargo in support of the logistics systems of the Military Services and Defense Agencies
data.PA: Pooled Air - Outbound shipment from an airport consolidation point to a final destination via an air move
data.PG: Pooled Piggyback - Outbound shipment consisting of a trailer on a railcar from a consolidation point to a final destination via rail move
data.PP: Pool to Pool - Shipment moves from one consolidation point to another consolidation point before final delivery
data.RC: Rail, Less than Carload - Movement by rail of a quantity of freight less than that required for the application of a carload rate
data.RR: Roadrailer - Used for shipments that travel by roadrailer, i.e., a multimodal rail/highway trailer
data.SB: Shipper Agent - Agent for piggyback code consolidation
data.SC: Shipper Agent (Truck) - Motor carrier agent for piggyback trailer consolidators
data.SD: Shipper Association - Non-profit cooperative consolidator or distributors of shipments by member firms
data.TA: Towaway Service - Movement of shipper owned trailers or semi-trailers loaded and/or pulled by carrier furnished power unit
data.WP: Water or Pipeline Intermodal Movement - A water move by barge or tanker followed by a pipeline move to the destination
data.Y: Military Intratheater Airlift Service - Method of movement of material from a point in a theater to another point within the same theater by military controlled aircraft
